QAPair.Question: What is (are) Tennis elbow surgery - discharge ?
QAPair.Answer: You have had surgery for tennis elbow . The surgeon made a cut (incision) over the injured tendon, then removed (excised) the unhealthy part of your tendon and repaired it. At home, be sure to follow your surgeon's instructions on how to take care of your elbow. Use the information below as a reminder.

QAPair.Question: What is the outlook for Tennis elbow surgery - discharge ?

Question.qtype: when to contact a medical professional

QAPair.Question: Do I need to see a doctor for Tennis elbow surgery - discharge ?
